name: X4: Foundations
description: X4: FOUNDATIONS, the long awaited sequel in the successful X series, brings our most sophisticated universe SIMULATION ever. Fly every ship, EXPLORE space or manage an empire; TRADE, FIGHT, BUILD and THINK carefully, while you embark on an epic journey.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 (64-bit), Windows 8 (64-bit), Windows 7 SP1 (64-bit) Processor: Intel i5-4590 3.3GHz or AMD equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 780/970 or AMD equivalent (Vulkan support required) Storage: 12 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 (64-bit), Windows 8 (64-bit), Windows 7 SP1 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Core i7-6700 or AMD equivalent Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 or AMD equivalent (Vulkan support required) Storage: 12 GB available space
